meaningMnemonic: You've seen the word 高い from a couple levels ago. This word is related to that. It's like 大きい versus 大きさ, where one describes the other. In this case, the 高さ is the <vocabulary>height</vocabulary> of something (while 高い is tall). This word isn't "price" though. For that you'd ask いくらですか？ (how much is it?).
readingMnemonic: Use the reading of 高い (たかい) to help you to learn and remember the reading for this one. They're the same except for the hiragana at the end.
